stuck_reaction.title: You're stuck on a problem for 2 hours. What do you do?

context_switch_energy.title: How do you handle context switching during a work session?
context_switch_energy.description: Some people thrive on variety, others lose momentum.

VISUAL_LEARNER.name: Visual Learner
VISUAL_LEARNER.summary: You absorb ideas through visuals, patterns, and thoughtful structure. Design-driven roadmaps and polished UI projects keep you engaged.

PRACTICAL_BUILDER.name: Practical Builder
PRACTICAL_BUILDER.summary: You learn best by building fast and iterating. Hands-on projects, prototypes, and shipping value keep you in the zone.

ANALYTICAL_THINKER.name: Analytical Thinker
ANALYTICAL_THINKER.summary: You love digging into complex problems and clean architectures. Solid fundamentals and deep problem-solving fuel your progress.

SOCIAL_COLLABORATOR.name: Social Collaborator
SOCIAL_COLLABORATOR.summary: You thrive in communities, pair sessions, and knowledge sharing. Collaborative learning and feedback loops keep you motivated.

CREATIVE_EXPLORER.name: Creative Explorer
CREATIVE_EXPLORER.summary: You chase novelty and creative expression. Experimental projects, motion, and storytelling with code light your fire.

STRUCTURED_PLANNER.name: Structured Planner
STRUCTURED_PLANNER.summary: You appreciate order, systems, and deliberate practice. Roadmaps that highlight best practices and clarity help you excel.

INDEPENDENT_RESEARCHER.name: Independent Researcher
INDEPENDENT_RESEARCHER.summary: You explore deeply on your own, connecting dots quietly. Self-led investigations and advanced topics keep you curious.

GOAL_ORIENTED_ACHIEVER.name: Goal-Oriented Achiever
GOAL_ORIENTED_ACHIEVER.summary: You are laser-focused on outcomes. Ambitious milestones, measurable wins, and efficient routines keep you moving forward.
